meanings.definition: A synthetic element with the symbol Hs and atomic number 108.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study the properties of hassium in laboratories.
meanings.sent2: The periodic table includes hassium as one of the synthetic elements.
meanings.sent3: When the professor accidentally spilled hassium in the lab, it caused a colorful reaction!
meanings.sent4: In the world of chemistry, hassium is like a mysterious puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The discovery of hassium opened up new possibilities for scientific exploration.
